title: NY Immigration Court Backlogs May Grow With New Migrant Influx
description: Immigration courts in New York State already had a backlog of 180,000 cases, before 21,000 new migrants arrived this summer.
dc:creator: Hurubie Meko

media:content.media:credit: Mostafa Bassim for The New York Times
media:content.media:description: A security guard outside a federal immigration court in Manhattan helps immigrants who arrived early to wait in line. Most are hoping to apply for asylum as a way to stay in the United States.
